name: rpcunet
description:
Welcome. :)

Here's game i made because i was bored, it is not very advanced and proffessional but you can have a good time playing it. In the game you need to shoot your enemies out of platform using shotgun that shoots explosing bullets.

Please, leave a comment with your impressions about game. :)

Also, everybody is welcome to weekend dev's coffe discord.          https://discord.gg/a2ERmfz

(Server files are for ubuntu x32, port is 1337, use both tcp and udp protocols. You can also host local server on windows in game.)
